LanguageData.Hemogenic.label: Water Drinker
LanguageData.Hemogenic.description: Carriers of this gene require a rare and precious liquid known as water. The resource can be gained in various ways, and if not consumed frequently leads to an eventually fatal condition known as dehydration.\n\nCarriers lose 2 water per day from necessary biological homeostatis.
LanguageData.HemogenDrain.label: Chronic Dehydration
LanguageData.HemogenDrain.description: Carriers lose an additional 8 water per day from accelerated biological homeostatis.
